TopicTitle: What kind of ocarina do I have? [photos coming later]

Articles.Content:
I've got a oval shaped ocarina with a mouth stem with 3 holes on the far left and 3 on the front right (6 total on top), 2 two on bottom, not including the mouth or voice hole. Best way to explain the shape is that it's like ocarinas like from The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

I bought this like 4 years ago and since I don't know what kind of tab sheet I don't know how to play it. 

I'm out at the moment but the second I get back I'll upload pictures.

Help?

1 hour ago, razark said:

Try https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ocarina#Types?

Seems it's a transverse/sweet potato but all the musical tabs show 10 hole transverse. So, I don't know how to translate those for mine.
